snippet: Stephen J. Kim agreed to serve a 13-month prison sentence for leaking classified C.I.A. information on North Korea to a Fox News reporter.
abstract: Stephen J Kim, former State Department contractor charged with leaking information from classified report about North Korea to a Fox News reporter in 2009, pleads guilty and agrees to serve 13-month prison sentence.
lead_paragraph: Stephen J. Kim agreed to serve a 13-month prison sentence for leaking classified C.I.A. information on North Korea to a Fox News reporter.

headline.main: Ex-Contractor at State Dept. Pleads Guilty in Leak Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Contractor at State Dept. Pleads Guilty in Leak Case
